Text:
Dear Boobsman,

Firstly, i would like to thank you for your generosity and sacrifice. i really appreciate all the time u spend in donating us alll free stuff. Please i have a special request... pls upload Score Magazine (issues- June and October 2011). I really would appreciate it if you grant this wish. All rapidshare i saw online have been taken down. Pls help!. With ur nickname, i am sure we both have similar interests.....Take care and thank u again
